Create an array of <lms-calendar-entry> elements for each day the entry spans
and add them to the entries array.

declarations.name: sourceLocale
declarations.description: The locale code that templates in this source code are written in.

declarations.name: targetLocales
declarations.description:
The other locale codes that this application is localized into. Sorted
lexicographically.

declarations.name: allLocales
declarations.description: All valid project locale codes. Sorted lexicographically.
This class handles calculations and adjustments for CalendarDate objects based on a specified direction.

declarations.name: getOverlappingEntitiesIndices

parameters.name: partitions
parameters.description: An array of partitions, where each partition is an array of intervals.

declarations.description: Calculates the indices and depths of overlapping entities within a set of partitions.

declarations.name: messages

type.text:
{
    day: () => msg('Day'),
    week: () => msg('Week'),
    month: () => msg('Month'),
    currentMonth: () => msg('Current Month'),
    allDay: () => msg('All Day'),
    today: () => msg('Today'),
    noTitle: () => msg('No Title'),
    noContent: () => msg('No Content'),
    noTime: () => msg('No Time'),
    eventDetails: () => msg('Event Details'),
    exportAsICS: () => msg('Export as ICS'),
    title: () => msg('Title'),
    time: () => msg('Time'),
    date: () => msg('Date'),
    notes: () => msg('Notes'),
    minimize: () => msg('Minimize'),
    close: () => msg('Close'),
    dragToMove: () => msg('Drag to move menu'),
    calendarWeek: () => msg('CW'),
}

declarations.name: partitionOverlappingIntervals
declarations.description:
This is an implementation of the sweep-line algorithm
Ref: https://www.baeldung.com/cs/finding-all-overlapping-intervals \
Example: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30472556/how-to-find-all-overlapping-ranges-and-partition-them-into-chunks
